formalpara.title: Figure 2. Hermaphrodite and male P lineages.
formalpara.para: Development of the ventral nervous systems. Dotted lines indicate the times nuclei migrate into the ventral cord. Divisions are anterior-posterior unless otherwise indicated. Modified and reprinted from Sulston, J. E., and Horvitz, H. R. (1977), Copyright (1977), with permission from Elsevier. Control-click or right-click to see larger image.
